name: Harsh
description: Open world survival meets fantasy role-playing game is the idea behind Harsh.  You start with nothing and must gather resources to craft, fight enemies and gather treasure to help you stay alive.  Choose to learn spells or focus on your physical traits to help you overcome both monsters and intelligent factions who react differently based on your actions and may even choose to raid your home base if you anger them enough.  Explore the open world or go on a dungeon crawl, the choice is up to you.
